email_chain.subject: Freight Inquiry: Iron Ore - Tubarão to Rotterdam
email_chain.body:
Dear Michael,

I hope this message finds you well.

We are looking to ship 150,000 MT of iron ore from Tubarão to Rotterdam. Could you provide a freight quote for this shipment? We are flexible on laycan, but ideally looking for a window in early December.

Looking forward to your response.

Best regards,
Laura Smith
Ocean Freight Brokers

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry: Iron Ore - Tubarão to Rotterdam
email_chain.body:
Hi Laura,

Thank you for your inquiry. We can offer the vessel MV SEA HORIZON, DWT 180,000, LOA 290m, for this shipment. The starting freight rate is USD 18.50/MT, with a laycan of December 5-10. The demurrage rate is USD 12,000 per day.

Please let me know if this works for you.

Best regards,
Michael Jones
Cargo Transport Ltd.

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry: Iron Ore - Tubarão to Rotterdam
email_chain.body:
Michael,

Thanks for the quick response. The laycan works for us, but the freight rate seems a bit high. The current market rate is closer to USD 17.00/MT. Can you adjust your offer accordingly?

Looking forward to your reply.

Best regards,
Laura

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry: Iron Ore - Tubarão to Rotterdam
email_chain.body:
Laura,

I understand your concern. Given the current market conditions, I can reduce the freight rate to USD 17.50/MT. This is our best offer at the moment.

Please confirm if this works for you.

Best regards,
Michael

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry: Iron Ore - Tubarão to Rotterdam
email_chain.body:
Michael,

USD 17.50/MT is acceptable. Let’s proceed with the laycan of December 5-10. Please send over the contract details at your earliest convenience.

Best regards,
Laura

email_chain.subject: Confirmed: Iron Ore - Tubarão to Rotterdam
email_chain.body:
Laura,

Great! I’ll send over the contract details shortly. Here’s a quick recap:

Commodity: Iron Ore
Quantity: 150,000 MT
Load Port: Tubarão
Discharge Port: Rotterdam
Incoterms: CFR
Vessel: MV SEA HORIZON
Freight: USD 17.50/MT
Laycan: December 5-10
Demurrage: USD 12,000/day

Thank you for your business!

Best regards,
Michael
